LanguageData.Miho_CeramicsPaste.label: Miho Ceramic Dough
LanguageData.Miho_CeramicsPaste.description: A raw material for ceramic that is well kneaded with various elements.
LanguageData.Miho_Ceramics.label: Miho Ceramic
LanguageData.Miho_MilitaryGradeBalisticCeramics.label: Miho Military Grade Ceramic
LanguageData.Miho_MilitaryGradeBalisticCeramics.descr: A reinforced material that combines steel and ceramic.
LanguageData.Miho_CelestialScale.label: Celestial Scale
LanguageData.Miho_CelestialScale.description: "It is the most powerful alloy in human history, composed of extremely compressed plasteel and negative mass exotic matter comparable to the nucleus of a neutron star..." - Mihoogle explains.
LanguageData.Miho_ExoticMatter.label: Exotic matter
LanguageData.Miho_ExoticMatter.description: A rare substance that has a negative mass and is rarely found on the rimworld.
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyMechCore.label: Miho Large Mech Core
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyMechCore.description: A massive engine used in the largest Miho mechanoids.
LanguageData.Miho_InariZushi.label: Miho Yubu Sushi
LanguageData.Miho_InariZushi.description: A sushi bento that foxes love. Made with substitute yubu. (Helianto, Corn/Potatoes, Rice)
LanguageData.Miho_Schematic.label: Miho Tech Documentation
LanguageData.Miho_Schematic.description: A document containing descriptions and schematics of Miho technology.
